title: Rambo: first blood. Part II (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Motion pictures and the war
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture sequels
description: He's on a mission and that's just where he belongs! He's told not to engage the enemy. "Just take pictures", they say. But telling Rambo to hold back is like ordering a rattle-snake not to bite. Rambo's dropped into the Vietnam jungle to find out if there are still any POW's about. There are. And now Rambo's going to get them home - on his own! Caption version only available. Rated: M
